content.p: As part of our vision for sport, University of Nottingham is committed to providing an environment for students to thrive and achieve on and off the field. We aim to create an environment which enables students to harness their motivation and build their confidence. Sport psychologyâ€™s predominant aim is to help athletes prepare psychologically for the demands of competition and training. At University of Nottingham Sport we have a dedicated sport psychologist on hand to support both student-athletes individually and our performance teams. Services include: Our practioners work hand-in-hand with our performance lifestyle and coaching team to identify where sport psychology support services may be beneficial, with student-athlete wellbeing our primary consideration. David Ross Sports Village University of Nottingham University Park Nottingham, NG7 2RD telephone: +44 (0)115 74 87000 email: sport@nottingham.ac.uk
